name: What in Carnation?!
description:
A cute little visual novel with an all-autistic cast!

Just when university is starting to feel a little too overwhelming, you stumble into the Botany Club where chill times and friendship await!

This game was made throughout the month of April as part of the Autistic Creative Festival's Game Jam (2022)

In the future, we plan on adding another character with another route!

This game does not support saving and is intender to be played in one sitting in-browser. It will not work on mobile devices!

When you launch the game, you may encounter the error 'TypeError: Cannot set properties of null (setting 'onclick').' If you press 'OK' the game will run.

MINIGAME TIPS

  • Type words that relate to the task at hand
  • If you're stuck, don't forget that many words have plurals ;)
